cot: The word "تمام" in this context is labeled as a determiner. This is because "تمام" is used to specify the noun "خواتین" (women), indicating the totality or entirety of the group. Determiners are words that modify nouns to provide context such as quantity, possession, or definiteness. Here, "تمام" specifies that all women who applied were included, making it function as a determiner.

The word "برا" in this context is labeled as an adjective. This is because "برا" is used to describe the noun "اثر" (effect), indicating the negative quality of the effect being discussed. Adjectives are words that modify nouns by providing additional information about their attributes. Here, "برا" provides information about the nature of the effect, making it function as an adjective.

The word "انہوں" in this context is labeled as a pronoun. This is because "انہوں" is used to refer to a previously mentioned or understood subject without naming them directly. Pronouns are words that take the place of nouns to avoid repetition and aid in the flow of sentences. Here, "انہوں" refers to a specific person mentioned earlier in the text, making it function as a pronoun.

The word "تاکہ" in this context is labeled as a subordinating conjunction. This is because "تاکہ" is used to connect two clauses, indicating the purpose or reason for the action in the main clause. Subordinating conjunctions introduce a dependent clause and show the relationship between it and the main clause. Here, "تاکہ" connects the clause "مسٹر کے چندر شیکھر راؤ کو اپنا محاسبہ کر لینا چاہیے" with "حقائق سامنے آ سکیں," explaining the purpose of the self-assessment, making it function as a subordinating conjunction.

The word "لگی" in this context is labeled as an auxiliary verb. This is because "لگی" is used to form the verb phrase "دھوکا دینے لگی ہے," indicating an ongoing action or state. Auxiliary verbs are used alongside main verbs to create different tenses, moods, or aspects. Here, "لگی" helps convey the continuous aspect of the action "دھوکا دینے," making it function as an auxiliary verb.

The word "ہجوم" in this context is labeled as a noun. This is because "ہجوم" refers to a group of people or a crowd, which is a person, place, thing, or concept. Nouns serve as the main subject or object within a sentence. Here, "ہجوم" describes the group of "ادب ذوق حضرات" (literary enthusiasts) attending the event, making it function as a noun.
